name: Four seasons
description: Steps from the Kremlin and Red Square in Moscow's historic heart, Old World glamour gets a contemporary spin at Four Seasons Hotel Moscow. Discover a bold reimagining of the legendary 1930s-era Hotel Moskva at our modern replica that puts destination dining and decadent spa treatments in the spotlight.
